revised_title: Electron Diffraction Investigation of Peri-bonds in Perylene
tldr: The authors conducted an electron diffraction investigation to study the peri-bonds in the perylene molecule. They determined the average carbon-carbon bond distance in perylene and found the peri-bond length to be longer than the average carbon-carbon bond distance in the naphthalene molecule. This research helped in understanding the molecular structure of perylene and provided insights into the peri-bonds' properties.
